categories.name: Naval Content
changes: Added ship sailing and exploration across the Great Seas
Implemented naval combat system with cannons, boarding, and ship upgrades
Added 5 unique ship types with different capabilities
Added sea monsters and pirate enemies
Implemented weather system affecting naval gameplay

categories.name: Underwater Realms
changes: Added 3 new underwater zones: Coral Kingdom, Abyssal Trench, and Sunken City
Implemented underwater movement and combat mechanics
Added oxygen system and underwater breathing equipment
Introduced 12 new underwater quests and storylines
Added underwater treasures and hidden locations

categories.name: New Class & Items
changes: Added new Aquatic class with water-based abilities
Introduced 20 new underwater weapons and armor sets
Added fishing system with 30+ fish species to catch
Added underwater crafting materials and recipes
